TopicTitle: [VIDEO SERIES] "Kerbal Space Program - Land on Every Planet"

Articles.Content:
This is a video series myself and JustnoFreakingWay have created, whereby we conquer the Kerbol System. Literally! Unlike the name suggests, this is not simply to land on every planet, but to land on every possibly celestial body in the Kerbol System (Excluding Kerbin, cheeky ). So far, myself and my fellow kerbonaut, JustnoFreakingWay, have almost finished landing on everything, with only Bop and Eeloo to go. This has been a tremendous experience, and I wish to share it with the KSP community. Not only does this serve as entertainment, it also acts as a tutorial. Each video contains interplanetary burns, landing procedures, and sometimes, the common comedy, just to keep the boredom at bay. As I said beforehand, we only have 2 more celestial bodies to land on, but remember, KSP is not finished, and there are still many planets to come! So what do you say, care to check it out? The links are below, thanks!

zHeathy's Channel (Me): http://www.youtube.com/user/zHeathy

> Playlist from zHeathy's perspective:

JustNoFreakingWay's Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/justnofreakingway

> (JustnoFreakingWay's perspective is not in a playlist unfortunately)

I hope you enjoy our content, feel free to leave any feedback or criticism, and I will see you in my mission to Eeloo!
